Class DoorStateClosed

java.lang.Object
engine.level.door.DoorState
engine.level.door.DoorStateClosed
public class DoorStateClosed extends DoorState
Representa el estado de la puerta "cerrada"
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri

    • checkPushLever

      public void checkPushLever(Player player)
      Si el player activa la palanca se realiza el cambio de estado mediante this.door.doorState = new DoorStateOpening(this.door);
